name: Flyer Kid
description:
This game was made for the Vaultacular Game Jam.
Theme: Here, Take One
Limitation: 3 Levels

In this game you play as a kid that needs to hand our flyers for the grand opening of an arcade. Your boss is a stingy guy so if you don't make your quota, he wont pay you. If you waste flyers (giving extra or leaving them on the ground) he'll dock your pay. 

Make it threw the three shifts of the day and leave with as much money as you can.

Tip: Giving a flyer to a group of people will count each one for with only one flyer. But if one person in the group already has a flyer they will be unhappy. So be careful.
